mapper.select: select emp_id, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_email, emp_tel, org_teamname as emp_dept, emp_posi, emp_level, emp_join, emp_resi, emp_sal, emp_pic, total_annday, annday_used from employee e join organization o on e.emp_dept=o.org_teamcode order by emp_name;

select o.org_groupname, o.org_teamname as emp_dept, emp_id, emp_name, emp_posi, emp_tel, emp_email, emp_level from employee e join organization o on e.emp_dept=o.org_teamcode order by o.org_groupname;

select org_teamname as emp_dept, emp_id, emp_name, emp_posi, total_annday, annday_used, (total_annday-annday_used) as annday_rest, emp_join, emp_resi from employee e join organization o on e.emp_dept = o.org_teamcode order by emp_dept;
mapper.insert: insert into employee(emp_id, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_email, emp_tel, emp_dept, emp_posi, emp_level, emp_sal, emp_pic, total_annday) values(#{emp_id}, #{emp_pw}, #{emp_name}, #{emp_email}, #{emp_tel}, #{emp_dept}, #{emp_posi}, #{emp_level}, #{emp_sal}, #{emp_pic}, #{total_annday})
mapper.update: update employee set emp_email = #{emp_email}, emp_pic = #{emp_pic}, emp_pw = #{emp_pw}, where emp_id = #{emp_id}
update employee set emp_name = #{emp_name}, emp_tel = #{emp_tel}, emp_dept = #{emp_dept}, emp_posi = #{emp_posi}, emp_email = #{emp_email}, emp_level = #{emp_level}, where emp_id = #{emp_id}
mapper.select: select org_groupname, group_concat(org_teamname separator '/') as teamList from organization group by org_groupname;
SELECT emp_id, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_level from employee where emp_id = #{emp_id}
select emp_name, org_teamname as emp_dept, emp_posi, emp_email, emp_tel, emp_pic from employee emp JOIN organization org on emp.emp_dept = org.org_teamcode where org.org_teamname = #{org_teamname}
select org_teamname as emp_dept, emp_id, emp_name, emp_posi, emp_tel, emp_email, emp_pic from employee emp JOIN organization org on emp.emp_dept = org.org_teamcode where emp_id = #{emp_id}
